Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.15210812]HIV-1 A:inhibition of infection in JC53-BL cells(IC50=3.26 ± 0.58 µg/ml);HIV-1 B:inhibition of infection in JC53-BL cells(IC50=1.74± 0.40 µg/ml);HIV-1 C:inhibition of infection in JC53-BL cells(IC50=4.31 ± 0.90 µg/ml);HIV-1 CRF01_AE:inhibition of infection in JC53-BL cells(IC50=2.09 ± 0.60 µg/ml);HIV-1 D:inhibition of infection in JC53-BL cells(IC50=2.31 ± 0.21 µg/ml);HIV-1 G:inhibition of infection in JC53-BL cells(IC50=3.04 ± 0.64 µg/ml);HIV-1 BF:inhibition of infection in JC53-BL cells(IC50=0.89 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide binds to gp120 and CD4, thereby inhibiting HIV entry.
